headline: This Congresswoman is Buying Adobe (ADBE)
summary: We recently published 10 Best AI Stocks to Buy According to American Politicians. Adobe Inc (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the best AI stocks to buy. Adobe Inc (NASDAQ:ADBE) is down 23% so far this year despite launching several AI features in its tools. Why? The market is concerned that a plethora of AI-powered design tools […]
